June 28, 1952 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Pittencrieff Park, Dunfermline, Fife, Scotland, UK Open Contest Champions: Bowhill Colliery FCBA 'A Band' Champions: Bowhill Colliery
FCBA 'B Band' Champions - Lochgelly Public.
Best Section 2 band - Bowhill Colliery. Best Section 3 band - Alloa Burgh. Best Section 4 band - Lochgelly Public.
Deportment - Tullis Russell.
14 bands competed.
Nov. 7, 2011, 4:21 p.m. Feb. 20, 2013, 4:25 p.m.
